title: Can we blow our nose while in prayer, & if we sneeze in prayer, can we say Alhamdulillah? Assim Al H
transcript: for zanna from uh from australia she now she says if i'm praying and my nose is running can i blow my nose with a tissue no problem at all you can keep a tissue in your hand all the time whenever it runs you blow or clean your nose no problem what about if i sneeze can i say alhamdulillah yes you can say alhamdulillah and there's no problem in that the prophet saslam was leading prayer once and one of the companions sneezed and said alhamdulillah and he did not tell him anything you
